newsitem.title: EU: EP DEVELOPMENT COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 28-30.
newsitem.headline: EP DEVELOPMENT COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 28-30.

text.p: Committee on Development and Cooperation [[ Monday 28 October 1996 ]] Coordinators' meeting on Tuesday 29 October, 9 - 9.30 a.m. 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE219.747 ) ===] In the presence of the Council and Commission 2. Chairman's announcements 3. Meeting with Mr Marin, Vice-President of the Commission (1) 4. Meeting with the Delphi Forum (2) 5. Meeting with the NGO Rugmark (3) 6. Announcements by the Commission 7. Sition in Zambia 10. Aid for uprooted people (refugees, displaced persons and returnees) in Asia n and Latin American developing countries (T03810) **II (T03810) SYN95162 COM(96)0234 C4-0374/96 + DEVE Fond R HOWITT Richard S. (PSE) (PE218.765 ) - Adoption of draft recommendation 11. HIV/AIDS related operations in developing countries (T03804) **II (T03804) SYN95164 COM(95)0293 C4-0372/96 + DEVE Fond ANDRE-LEONARD Anne. (ELD) (PE218.762 ) - Adoption of draft recommendation 12. The VOTES will be held on 29 October at 3 p.m. 34.3 ***************************************************************
